Probably a little late but just in case anyone needs to do this, what I have done in the past is grabbed the blob from the file input and then I base 64 encoded it and just passed it to the serverless function as a string where it was then passed into a blob to be uploaded to the HubSpot File system.

<https://stackoverflow.com/questions/6978156/get-base64-encode-file-data-from-input-form>

I used the FileReader solution
